name: 蔡尤溪
objective:
先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學
本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰
1. 火災動力學
2. 防火材料性質
3. 排煙技術
4. 防火排煙設備
5. 防火材料及設備測試
6. 建築物防火排煙設計
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Smoke property analysis
3. Stack effect analysis
4. Wind effects analysis
5. Elevator piston effects
6. Airflow analysis
7. Computer models
8. Air moving equipment
9. Mid-term
10.Analytical model
11.Stairwell pressurization
12.Height limit for stairwell pressurization
13.Elevator smoke control
14.HVAC system applications
15.Smoke movement in Atria
16.Smoke analysis in Atria
17.Measurement methods
18.Final exam
materials: Principles of smoke management, Klote and Milke, ASHRAE
